exoticPerk.name: Transfusion Matrix
exoticPerk.description: Kills with Arc melee abilities trigger health regeneration and restore melee energy.

exoticPerk.name: Lancer's Vigil
exoticPerk.description: Diamond Lances create Stasis crystals on impact when thrown, with more crystals created by hitting bosses and vehicles. While using a Stasis subclass and behind your rally barricade, rapid precision hits and combatant final blows with a Stasis weapon creates a Diamond Lance near you.

exoticPerk.name: Resolute
exoticPerk.description: Arc final blows grant an escalating damage bonus with Arc weapons. Gain an overshield when activating Fists of Havoc, and gain the highest tier damage bonus to Arc weapons when your Fists of Havoc Super ends.

exoticPerk.name: Starless Night
exoticPerk.description: Targets that enter Ward of Dawn are blinded, while allies that pass through gain a Void overshield. Guarding with Sentinel Shield blinds nearby targets.

exoticPerk.name: Solar Rampart
exoticPerk.description: Solar final blows recharge your Barricade, which unleashes a blast of Solar energy that scorches targets when summoned.

exoticPerk.name: Cauterizing Flame
exoticPerk.description: When you are critically wounded with full class ability energy or when you cast a Barricade, create a Sunspot at your location that has improved restoration effects.

exoticPerk.name: Dreaded Visage
exoticPerk.description: Grants ability energy when you're damaged. When critically wounded, regain maximum health on kills.

exoticPerk.name: Vengeance
exoticPerk.description: Highlights the target who dares to damage you. Track down and destroy them for an overshield.

exoticPerk.name: Kintsugi
exoticPerk.description: Final blows from weapons with a damage type matching your subclass energy create a burst of healing around you. After reviving or being revived, you gain an aura that provides overshields to you and nearby allies.

exoticPerk.name: Fury Conductors
exoticPerk.description: Melee hits grant Armor Charge, and you take less melee damage while you have Armor Charge. Taking melee damage causes you to emit a burst of damaging Arc energy that Jolts targets, consuming your Armor Charge and dealing more damage based on the number of stacks consumed.

exoticPerk.name: Bring the Heat
exoticPerk.description: Fusion Grenades now explode on impact and gain increased throw speed. Final blows with Fusion Grenades grant grenade energy.

exoticPerk.name: Assault Barricade
exoticPerk.description: You and allies can shoot through your Towering Barricade, which has an increased cooldown and reduced health and duration.

exoticPerk.name: Horns of Doom
exoticPerk.description:
Defeating targets with Void damage has a chance to grant an escalating bonus to damage with Void weapons. Defeating targets with Void melee grants Super energy.

While Sentinel Shield is active, defeating targets with melee attacks recharges Shield Throw, which extends your Super on hitting a target.

exoticPerk.name: Glacial Guard
exoticPerk.description: Stasis final blows have a chance to grant an escalating bonus to Stasis weapon damage. Replaces your Barricade ability with a personal overshield. When you activate your Barricade, you gain the highest-tier Stasis weapon damage bonus and create a burst around yourself that slows combatants. While you have this overshield, you are slowed and Barricade does not recharge.

exoticPerk.name: Force Multiplier
exoticPerk.description: While using a Void subclass, rapid Shotgun final blows or defeating a powerful combatant with a Shotgun will grant a Void overshield and start health regeneration. While you have a Void overshield, Shotguns deal additional damage, and Shotgun final blows refresh the overshield. Provides a moderate benefit to Shotgun airborne effectiveness and reload speed.

exoticPerk.name: Hammer of the Gods
exoticPerk.description: Defeating targets with your Thunderclap melee restores melee energy. Targets near you when you use your Thunderclap suffer lightning strikes and become jolted; being amplified increases the damage of these lightning strikes.

exoticPerk.name: Percussive Flames
exoticPerk.description: Modifies Burning Maul into a single high-damage slam of your hammer that creates five cyclones of flame. Consecration's second slam creates a cyclone of flame.

exoticPerk.name: Myrmidon's Reach
exoticPerk.description:
Gain a second charge of your Shield Throw melee. Your Shield Throw melee now weakens targets and becomes shield-piercing, stunning [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. 

When you stun a [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champion with your Shield Throw melee, you regain a melee charge.

exoticPerk.name: Clenched Fist
exoticPerk.description: Maximizes guard stats on equipped Swords. You take reduced damage while blocking with a Sword. Rapidly damaging targets after blocking shots with a Sword grants restoration for a duration determined by the number of shots blocked.

exoticPerk.name: Biotic Enhancements
exoticPerk.description: Increased melee lunge range. Improved melee and Super damage when you're surrounded.

exoticPerk.name: Ursine Guard
exoticPerk.description: Move faster while guarding when Sentinel Shield is active. Guarded damage converts to Super energy when the Super ends.

exoticPerk.name: Burning Fists
exoticPerk.description: Melee kills increase melee damage for a period of time. Additional kills extend duration and increase effects.

exoticPerk.name: Auto-Loading Link
exoticPerk.description: Steadily reloads a portion of your equipped Auto Rifle
s magazine from reserves. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Auto Rifles and Machine Guns.

exoticPerk.name: Barri-nade
exoticPerk.description: Using your class ability channels defensive Light inward, providing a grenade that creates a barricade on impact.

exoticPerk.name: And Another Thing
exoticPerk.description: Gain an additional grenade charge.

exoticPerk.name: Survival Well
exoticPerk.description: Generates an additional Orb of Power from Supers and a healing pulse when Barricade is activated.

exoticPerk.name: Glorious Charge
exoticPerk.description: Greatly increases your Thundercrash impact damage. Gain an overshield that lasts longer the farther you travel before striking a target.

exoticPerk.name: Sunfire Furnace
exoticPerk.description: Solar takedowns while standing in a Sunspot create a Sunspot. Greatly improves recharge rate of your Solar abilities while your Super is charged. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

exoticPerk.name: Overflowing Light
exoticPerk.description: Using an ability (grenade, melee, or Barricade) empowers the other two abilities. Empowered means abilities have faster regen, melees and grenades do more damage, and Barricades have more hit points.

exoticPerk.name: Glacial Fortification
exoticPerk.description: When using the Stasis subclass, your Barricade becomes a wall of Stasis crystals that slows nearby targets when created. Standing behind this barricade will grant you and your allies increased weapon reload speed, stability, and range.

exoticPerk.name: Spheromatik Trigger
exoticPerk.description: Powered melee final blows unleash a damaging explosion. Finishers and final blows against more powerful targets increase the radius and damage of the explosion.

exoticPerk.name: Puppeteer's Control
exoticPerk.description: Drengr's Lash spawns two additional projectiles, tracks targets more aggressively, and travels farther. Gain Woven Mail when suspending targets.

exoticPerk.name: Reflective Vents
exoticPerk.description: Improved slide. Sliding after sprinting for a short time reflects incoming projectiles.

exoticPerk.name: Linear Actuators
exoticPerk.description: Increases sprint speed. Sprinting builds up a static charge. After melee-attacking an enemy, that charge will chain damage to nearby enemies.

exoticPerk.name: Jump Jets
exoticPerk.description: Provides additional aerial maneuverability and enables accurate hipfire while you're in the air during Lift. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons while hipfiring.

exoticPerk.name: Seriously, Watch Out
exoticPerk.description: Grants an overshield when you're sprinting at full health with Seismic Strike, Hammer Strike, or Shield Bash equipped and charged. Hits with these abilities recharge a portion of your melee energy.

exoticPerk.name: Mecha Holster
exoticPerk.description: Reloads stowed Submachine Guns and allows you to ready them instantly. Improves your handling with Submachine Guns and your movement while wielding one. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Submachine Guns.

exoticPerk.name: Peregrine Strike
exoticPerk.description: All shoulder charge abilities (Seismic Strike, Hammer Strike, or Shield Bash) deal bonus damage when activated in the air. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

exoticPerk.name: Beacons of Empowerment
exoticPerk.description: Sol Invictus lasts twice as long. Allies who pass through your Sunspot are granted Sol Invictus and Solar restoration.

exoticPerk.name: Firewalker
exoticPerk.description: Solar final blows periodically grant you an escalating bonus to weapon damage, and Solar grenade final blows grant you the highest bonus. You are harder to slow or freeze with Stasis, and when you break out, you take no damage from doing so, creating a burst of Solar energy around yourself.

exoticPerk.name: Vanishing Execution
exoticPerk.description: Powered melee final blows grant invisibility and restore a portion of health and shields. Finishers and final blows against more powerful targets increase the duration of the invisibility and the amount of health and shields restored.

exoticPerk.name: Voltaic Mirror
exoticPerk.description: Attacks you redirect with your Arc Staff deal massively increased damage and generate Orbs of Power for your allies. Guarding with your Arc Staff does not consume extra Super energy.

exoticPerk.name: Hawkeye Hack
exoticPerk.description: Modifies Golden Gun to fire a single high-damage shot. Enemies eliminated by the shot explode and grant you Super energy.

exoticPerk.name: Acrobat's Focus
exoticPerk.description: Gain Woven Mail when activating grapple. Increased flinch resistance while Woven Mail is active.

exoticPerk.name: Relentless Tracker
exoticPerk.description: Damaging a powerful combatant or Guardian with an ability grants you a temporary bonus to weapon damage matching your subclass type. Defeating that target with a weapon matching the damage type of your subclass creates an elemental pickup.

exoticPerk.name: Vanishing Shadow
exoticPerk.description: Increases the duration of any invisibility effects. While you are invisible, your melee recharges faster, your weapons reload faster, and your Recovery is greatly increased.

exoticPerk.name: Upgraded Sensor Pack
exoticPerk.description: Provides radar while you're aiming. Enhances your radar resolution while crouched. Visually marks targets. Deals more damage to low-health marked targets. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

exoticPerk.name: Light Shift
exoticPerk.description: Replaces your Stasis subclass Dodge ability with a longer range, faster moving shift that partially cloaks you during use. After shifting, your Stasis and Arc weapons deal increased damage for a short time.

exoticPerk.name: Burning Souls
exoticPerk.description: Dodging gives a small health and shield bump.

exoticPerk.name: Skittering Stinger
exoticPerk.description:
Weighted Knife gains a second bounce. Rapid precision hits with your weapons grant Weighted Knife a significant damage bonus, bonus strength, and the ability to stun unshielded combatants for a short time.

Empowered Weighted Knife is strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

exoticPerk.name: Roast 'Em
exoticPerk.description:
Your Proximity Knife scorches targets it damages with its explosions, or ignites targets on final blow.

After throwing a Proximity Knife, you gain increased melee regeneration until the knife explodes.

exoticPerk.name: Touch of Venom
exoticPerk.description: Punching someone with full melee energy will instantly cast Smoke Bomb. Your Smoke Bombs deal increased damage, regenerate more quickly when stuck to a surface, and grant you Truesight after damaging a target.

exoticPerk.name: Cross Counter
exoticPerk.description: Using your Arc melee ability or being hit by a melee attack will allow you to follow up with an extremely powerful melee counterpunch that will heal you.

exoticPerk.name: Spring-Loaded Mounting
exoticPerk.description: Increases Sidearm ready and reload speed. While you're critically wounded, swapping to a Sidearm increases its damage. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Sidearms.

exoticPerk.name: Winged Eclipse
exoticPerk.description: Your grenade becomes a cage of loyal moths that release on impact and fly toward the nearest target or ally. If they reach a target, they detonate in a blinding explosion; if they reach an ally, the moths grant your ally a Void overshield.

exoticPerk.name: Adamantine Brace
exoticPerk.description: Bow charges can be held indefinitely. Gain a bonus to the Bow's damage when released, based on how long the charge was held. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Bows.

exoticPerk.name: Depths of Duskfield
exoticPerk.description: Your Duskfield grenades have a much larger effect radius. Allies inside the Duskfield take reduced damage and targets inside the area deal reduced damage.

exoticPerk.name: Nightmare Fuel
exoticPerk.description: Dealing melee damage reloads your currently equipped weapon. Charged melee final blows reload all weapons. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons, and movement speed and jump height after dealing melee damage.

exoticPerk.name: Sharp Edges
exoticPerk.description: Hits and kills with Blade Barrage will return Super energy after the Super ends.

exoticPerk.name: New Tricks
exoticPerk.description: Improves Skip Grenade, and you gain an additional Skip Grenade charge. Skip Grenade returns energy when it damages enemies.

exoticPerk.name: Halberdier's Reach
exoticPerk.description: Increases Glaive reload speed and melee damage when surrounded. Glaive melee final blows overflow a round to the magazine. Glaive projectile final blows detonate if the Glaive deals damage matching your subclass type.

exoticPerk.name: Wish-Dragon Teeth
exoticPerk.description: Increases Tripmine Grenade duration and blast radius. Ability damage grants Tripmine Grenade energy.

exoticPerk.name: Roving Assassin
exoticPerk.description: Each Spectral Blades kill you make before going into stealth will restore more of your Super energy.

exoticPerk.name: See Me, Feel Me
exoticPerk.description: Your Void weapons gain Volatile Rounds after you emerge from being invisible. When you are invisible and defeat a combatant while using a finisher, all of your weapons gain bonus damage; you and your nearby allies gain a reserve overshield and improved class ability regeneration. These reserve overshields can be deployed by using a class ability.

exoticPerk.name: Probability Matrix
exoticPerk.description: Increases the chaining capabilities of Arcbolt Grenades. Damaging enemies with Jolt lightning strikes and collecting Ionic Traces both grant additional Arcbolt Grenade energy. Arcbolt Grenades stun  [Disruption] Overload Champions and delay their health regeneration.

exoticPerk.name: Beyond The Veil
exoticPerk.description: You gain a second Smoke Bomb charge and have damage resistance while invisible. When you make an ally invisible, they gain damage resistance while invisible and you gain melee energy.

exoticPerk.name: Scissor Fingers
exoticPerk.description: Grants two knives per charge.

exoticPerk.name: Synapse Junctions
exoticPerk.description: Quick successive attacks with Arc Staff increase its damage output and duration.

exoticPerk.name: Mobius Conduit
exoticPerk.description: [Super]  : Deactivate Arc Staff early to create a blinding explosion and gain a temporary boost to Arc weapon damage. Arc Staff consumes energy more slowly when not attacking.

exoticPerk.name: Wraithmetal Mail
exoticPerk.description: Dodging reloads all weapons and increases both movement and weapon handling speeds for a brief time.

exoticPerk.name: Double Dodge
exoticPerk.description: Gain a second dodge charge.

exoticPerk.name: Rapid Cooldown
exoticPerk.description: Increased grenade, melee, and dodge regeneration while sprinting. Dodging increases your sprint speed.

exoticPerk.name: Misdirection
exoticPerk.description: Dodging disorients nearby enemies and temporarily removes their radar.

exoticPerk.name: Illegally Modded Holster
exoticPerk.description: When you ready a fully loaded Hand Cannon that deals Kinetic damage or a damage type that matches your subclass energy type, each hit from that Hand Cannon increases the damage of the next shot for a short time against a combatant. Hand Cannons ready faster and are more accurate immediately after swapping to them. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Hand Cannons while the buff is active.

exoticPerk.name: Uncanny Arrows
exoticPerk.description: Provides ability energy for each target tethered by Deadfall anchors. Moebius Quiver has an additional shot.

exoticPerk.name: The Dance
exoticPerk.description: Activating your dodge ability while near targets allows you to dodge additional times for a short period. Defeating targets extends the duration of the additional dodge.

exoticPerk.name: Tight Fit
exoticPerk.description: Dodging boosts reload speed, handling, and airborne effectiveness for you and nearby allies. While the buff is active, final blows and additional dodges increase the buff strength and refresh the timer. Maxes out at 5 stacks.

exoticPerk.name: Hydraulic Boosters
exoticPerk.description: Increases sprint speed and slide distance while your dodge energy is full and improves High Jump, Strafe Jump, and Triple Jump.

exoticPerk.name: Feast of Light
exoticPerk.description: You gain additional Super energy from Orbs of Power you pick up. While your Super energy is full, picking up an Orb of Power overcharges your Super, causing you to gain a burst of healing when cast and a bonus to your Super damage. At maximum overcharge, you also gain an overshield.

exoticPerk.name: Parting Gift
exoticPerk.description:
Dodging leaves behind an explosive that detonates after a short delay, damaging targets around it and creating a secondary effect based on your subclass energy type:
• [Arc] Blinds targets.
• [Solar] Scorches targets.
• [Void] Suppresses targets.
• [Stasis] Slows targets.
• [Strand] Severs targets.

exoticPerk.name: Insatiable
exoticPerk.description: Immediately regenerate health, melee, grenade, and Rift energy upon activating your Super. Nearby allies recharge class abilities faster.

exoticPerk.name: Move to Survive
exoticPerk.description: Blink further and more frequently. Weapon readies quickly out of Blink and radar remains up. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

exoticPerk.name: High Priority
exoticPerk.description: Steadily reloads a portion of your equipped Trace Rifle's magazine from reserves. Damaging a vehicle, boss, or Champion with a Trace Rifle marks them as the target. When an ally defeats the marked target, Special ammo is generated for you and Heavy ammo for your allies.

exoticPerk.name: Conduction Tines
exoticPerk.description: Arc ability or jolt final blows increase the recharge rate of your Arc abilities and extend the duration of Stormtrance.

exoticPerk.name: Rites of Ember
exoticPerk.description: Your Daybreak projectiles deal more damage and scorch targets on impact. Your scorch is improved and you gain a small amount of melee energy when your scorch damages a target.

exoticPerk.name: Cerebral Uplink
exoticPerk.description: Highlights priority targets and improves the regeneration speed of your grenade, melee, and Rift abilities. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

exoticPerk.name: Ionic Conductor
exoticPerk.description: Ionic traces you create move faster and grant you additional ability energy. Nearby allies also gain ability energy when you collect an ionic trace.

exoticPerk.name: Warlord's End
exoticPerk.description: Powered melee final blows create a burst of energy that weakens nearby targets. Finishers and final blows against more powerful targets increase the radius of the burst and the length of the weakening effect.

exoticPerk.name: Abyssal Extractors
exoticPerk.description: Void-damage kills increase ability energy recharge rate.

exoticPerk.name: Actual Grandeur
exoticPerk.description: Provides additional damage resistance during Nova Bomb. Nova Bomb kills grant Super energy.

exoticPerk.name: Dearly Departed
exoticPerk.description: Your Rift provides damage reduction to allied Guardians standing in it. Grants Rift energy when you are critically wounded. On your death, creates a healing rift on your corpse.

exoticPerk.name: The Fourth Magic
exoticPerk.description: Weapon final blows with a damage type matching your subclass energy grant Death Throes, which provides a grenade damage bonus and grants you grenade energy. When you have Death Throes and throw a grenade, nearby allies gain greatly increased grenade regeneration for a short time.

exoticPerk.name: Hearts of Ice
exoticPerk.description: Your Winter's Wrath Shockwave deals increased shatter damage. Allies in range of your Shockwave gain an overshield and increased damage with Stasis weapons.

exoticPerk.name: One with the Void
exoticPerk.description: Your Void Souls have a longer duration. They also gain escalating damage and durability as they defeat targets. You can retrieve your Void Souls by interacting with them, allowing them to be redeployed.

exoticPerk.name: The Whispers
exoticPerk.description: Gain an additional melee charge. Charged melee final blows spawn an Orb of Power.

exoticPerk.name: Chaotic Exchanger
exoticPerk.description: Resist incoming damage while charging your Void grenade. Charged Void grenades return grenade energy on a hit.

exoticPerk.name: Dynamic Duo
exoticPerk.description: [Grenade]  : Convert your Arc grenade into a Arc Soul and become amplified. The Arc Soul functions as an autonomous turret.

exoticPerk.name: Vampire's Caress
exoticPerk.description: Melee kills instantly restore a large amount of health and continue to restore health afterwards for a short duration.

exoticPerk.name: Grasp of the Devourer
exoticPerk.description:
Damaging combatants poisons them, dealing increasing damage over time. Defeating a poisoned combatant spreads the condition.

Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all Weapons of Sorrow.

exoticPerk.name: Scatter Charge
exoticPerk.description: You gain an additional Scatter Grenade charge. Enables tracking for Scatter Grenade projectiles.

exoticPerk.name: Cobra Totemic
exoticPerk.description: Weapons ready and reload very quickly. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

exoticPerk.name: Fervid Coldsnap
exoticPerk.description: Your Coldsnap grenades have an additional charge that recharges quicker on direct impact. The seeker spawned from Coldsnap grenades travels further.

exoticPerk.name: Helium Spirals
exoticPerk.description: Increases the duration of Solar Grenades. Solar melee kills grant unlimited Solar Grenade energy for a brief time.

exoticPerk.name: Warlord's Sigil
exoticPerk.description: Defeating targets with melee attacks increases your melee damage. Targets encased by Penumbral Blast automatically shatter.

exoticPerk.name: Crystalline Transistor
exoticPerk.description: Precision final blows from Kinetic weapons create an explosion that deals damage in the element of your subclass and applies elemental effects.

exoticPerk.name: Absorption Cells
exoticPerk.description: Takedowns with weapons that have a damage type matching your subclass element grant you Super energy. While your Super energy is full, you instead gain a temporary bonus to weapon damage of the type matching your subclass element.

exoticPerk.name: Battle-Hearth
exoticPerk.description: Kills and assists you make while standing in your Well of Radiance return Super energy.

exoticPerk.name: Blood Magic
exoticPerk.description: While standing in any rift, gain a bonus to weapons with a damage type matching your subclass damage type. Weapon final blows while standing in any rift pause the rift's countdown, extending its duration.

exoticPerk.name: Fusion Harness
exoticPerk.description: Fusion Grenades have an additional charge and recharge from empowered weapon damage, with empowered weapon final blows granting more energy. Defeating targets with Fusion Grenades grant Rift energy.

exoticPerk.name: Ascending Amplitude
exoticPerk.description: Each target you defeat with Stormtrance increases the damage you deal with it and refunds Super energy when Stormtrance ends.

exoticPerk.name: Planetary Torrent
exoticPerk.description: Rifts periodically release Arc shockwaves. Final blows with these shockwaves create an Arc explosion. While an Arc subclass is equipped, the shockwaves and subsequent explosions blind nearby targets. Rift energy recharges faster when you are surrounded by targets.

exoticPerk.name: Tome of Dawn
exoticPerk.description: When Dawnblade is equipped, aiming weapons while you
s duration, and weapon final blows reload your Solar weapons from reserves. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

exoticPerk.name: Blessing of Order
exoticPerk.description: Standing in a healing rift creates Noble Seekers that seek out allies that are not in a rift and heal them. Standing in an empowering rift creates Noble Seekers that grant both you and your ally a damage bonus. Each time a Noble Seeker finds one of your allies, the duration of your rift is briefly extended while you are standing in it. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of the Hand Cannon Lumina.

exoticPerk.name: Close Enough
exoticPerk.description: Damaging targets with Chaos Reach extends its duration. Collecting Ionic Traces grants you energy for Chaos Reach.

exoticPerk.name: Alchemical Etchings
exoticPerk.description: Your Rifts gain the additional ability to increase weapon reload speeds. Empowering Rift makes weapons effective over longer ranges.

exoticPerk.name: Embers of Light
exoticPerk.description: Defeating combatants or Guardians while Daybreak is active creates a healing and empowering rift at their location. While standing in any rift, [Solar] Solar weapon final blows grant Rift energy. When your Rift energy is full, final blows consume your Rift energy and create a healing and empowering rift at the target's location.

exoticPerk.name: Soaring Fusilier
exoticPerk.description: Air dodge reloads all of your weapons and improves the airborne effectiveness of Fusion Rifles and Linear Fusion Rifles; final blows with these weapons make you radiant. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Fusion Rifles and Linear Fusion Rifles.

exoticPerk.name: Devouring Rift
exoticPerk.description: Casting an empowering rift will grant you Devour. Damage dealt by you and your allies from within your empowering rift will disrupt combatants.

exoticPerk.name: Swarmers
exoticPerk.description: Destroying a Tangle spawns a Threadling. Your Threadlings unravel targets that they damage.

exoticPerk.name: Strange Protractor
exoticPerk.description: Sprint speed increased. After a short time sprinting, your currently equipped weapon is automatically reloaded.
